metadata.title: The installation procedure via Flash memory

section.title: The Installation procedure via Flash memory
Flash card
section.p: You can download the CAB file approriate for your organiser and install it onto a Compact Flash or Secure Digital card. Place it in your organiser. Use File Manager on your organiser to find the CAB and click on it to execute it. Follow the onscreen instructions, the CAB file will be deleted after installation.
